description:
Kiriyume reveals herself as the human stand-in for the god Kiryuu. Kyo and the girls want to help her out of her isolation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les écolières n`auraient peut-être pas pu sauver le dieu de la noyade si elles avaient tardé
Tadoritsuku no ga Osokattara Oboreru Kamisama o Sukuenakatta Kamo Shirenai Shougakusei-tachi
The Grade School Kids Might`ve Not Been Able to Save the Drowning God If They Hadn`t Gotten There in Time
たどりつくのが遅かったら溺れる神様を救えなかったかもしれない小学生達
늦었다면 물에 빠진 신을 못 구했을지도 모를 초등학생들
